subject: Baseball
Yankee Stadium (NYC)
lead_paragraph: After a rain delay of 5 hours 26 minutes, the Yankees were dominated in front of a crowd of roughly 10,000 fans by a pitcher who had never won a major league game.
snippet: After a rain delay of 5 hours 26 minutes, the Yankees were dominated in front of a crowd of roughly 10,000 fans by a pitcher who had never won a major league game.
